verses.verse: And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>spoke<s%> to them <S%G3825>again<s%> in <S%G3850>parables,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

"The <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> may be <S%G3666>compared<s%> to a <S%G444>king,<s%> <S%G935><s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G4160>gave<s%> a <S%G1062>wedding<s%> <S%G1062>feast<s%> for his <S%G5207>son.<s%>

"And he <S%G649>sent<s%> out his <S%G1401>slaves<s%> to <S%G2564>call<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who had been <S%G2564>invited<s%> to the <S%G1062>wedding<s%> <S%G1062>feast,<s%> and they were <S%G3756>unwilling<s%> <S%G2309><s%> to <S%G2064>come.<s%>

<S%G3825>"Again<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> out <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G1401>slaves<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3004>'Tell<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who have been <S%G2564>invited,<s%> <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%G2090>prepared<s%> my <S%G712>dinner;<s%> my <S%G5022>oxen<s%> and my <S%G4619>fattened<s%> <S%G4619>livestock<s%> are [all] <S%G2380>butchered<s%> and <S%G3956>everything<s%> is <S%G2092>ready;<s%> <S%G1205>come<s%> to the <S%G1062>wedding<s%> <S%G1062>feast.<s%> "'

"But they <S%G272>paid<s%> <S%G272>no<s%> <S%G272>attention<s%> and <S%G565>went<s%> their <S%G565>way,<s%> <S%G3739>one<s%> to his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G68>farm,<s%> <S%G3739>another<s%> <S%G1161><s%> to his <S%G1171>business,<s%>
and the <S%G3062>rest<s%> <S%G2902>seized<s%> his <S%G1401>slaves<s%> and <S%G5195>mistreated<s%> them and <S%G615>killed<s%> them.

"But the <S%G935>king<s%> was <S%G3710>enraged<s%> and <S%G3992>sent<s%> his <S%G4753>armies,<s%> and <S%G622>destroyed<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G5406>murderers,<s%> and <S%G7066>set<s%> their <S%G4172>city<s%> on <S%G7066>fire.<s%>
<S%G5119>"Then<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> to his <S%G1401>slaves,<s%> 'The <S%G1062>wedding<s%> is <S%G2092>ready,<s%> but <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G2564>invited<s%> were not <S%G514>worthy.<s%>

<S%G4198>'Go<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to the <S%G1327>main<s%> <S%G3598>highways,<s%> and as <S%G3745>many<s%> as you <S%G2147>find<s%> [there,] <S%G2564>invite<s%> to the <S%G1062>wedding<s%> <S%G1062>feast.<s%>'

"And <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G1401>slaves<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out into the <S%G3598>streets,<s%> and <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> they <S%G2147>found,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> and <S%G18>good;<s%> and the <S%G3567>wedding<s%> <S%G3567>hall<s%> was <S%G4092>filled<s%> with <S%G345>dinner<s%> <S%G345>guests.<s%>

"But when the <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G1525>came<s%> in to <S%G2300>look<s%> <S%G2300>over<s%> the <S%G345>dinner<s%> <S%G345>guests,<s%> he <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> not <S%G1746>dressed<s%> in <S%G1062>wedding<s%> <S%G1742>clothes,<s%>

and he <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2083>'Friend,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> did you <S%G1525>come<s%> in <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G3361>without<s%> <S%G2192><s%> <S%G1062>wedding<s%> <S%G1742>clothes<s%>?' And he was <S%G5392>speechless.<s%>

<S%G5119>"Then<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G1249>servants,<s%> <S%G1210>'Bind<s%> him <S%G5495>hand<s%> and <S%G4228>foot,<s%> and <S%G1544>cast<s%> him into the <S%G1857>outer<s%> <S%G4655>darkness;<s%> in that <S%G1563>place<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> shall be <S%G2805>weeping<s%> and <S%G1030>gnashing<s%> of <S%G3599>teeth.<s%>'
"For <S%G4183>many<s%> are <S%G2822>called,<s%> but <S%G3641>few<s%> [are] <S%G1588>chosen.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> and <S%G4824>counseled<s%> <S%G2983><s%> <S%G4824>together<s%> <S%G3704>how<s%> they might <S%G3802>trap<s%> Him in what He <S%G3056>said.<s%>

And they <S%G649>sent<s%> their <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to Him, along with the <S%G2265>Herodians,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> we <S%G3609>know<s%> that You are <S%G227>truthful<s%> and <S%G1321>teach<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G225>truth,<s%> and <S%G3199>defer<s%> to <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one;<s%> for You are not <S%G991>partial<s%> <S%G4383><s%> to <S%G3762>any.<s%>
<S%G3004>"Tell<s%> us <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> do You <S%G1380>think<s%>? Is it <S%G1832>lawful<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> a poll-tax to <S%G2541>Caesar,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> not?"
But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1097>perceived<s%> their <S%G4189>malice,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>"Why<s%> are you <S%G3985>testing<s%> Me, you <S%G5273>hypocrites<s%>?
<S%G1925>"Show<s%> Me the <S%G3546>coin<s%> [used] for the poll-tax." And they <S%G4374>brought<s%> Him a <S%G1220>denarius.<s%>
And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"Whose<s%> <S%G1504>likeness<s%> and <S%G1923>inscription<s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%>?"

They <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2541>"Caesar<s%>'s." <S%G5119>Then<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3767>"Then<s%> <S%G591>render<s%> to Caesar the things that are Caesar's; and to <S%G2316>God<s%> the things that are God's."
And <S%G191>hearing<s%> [this,] they <S%G2296>marveled,<s%> and <S%G863>leaving<s%> Him, they <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away.<s%>
On that <S%G2250>day<s%> [some] <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%> (who <S%G3004>say<s%> there is <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G386>resurrection<s%>) <S%G4334>came<s%> to Him and <S%G1905>questioned<s%> Him,

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G1437>'If<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G599>dies,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5043>children,<s%> his <S%G80>brother<s%> as next of kin shall <S%G1918>marry<s%> his <S%G1135>wife,<s%> and <S%G450>raise<s%> up an <S%G4690>offspring<s%> to his <S%G80>brother.<s%>'

<S%G1161>"Now<s%> there were <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%> with us; and the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G1060>married<s%> and <S%G5053>died,<s%> and <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4690>offspring<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> his <S%G1135>wife<s%> to his <S%G80>brother;<s%>
<S%G3668>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G1208>second,<s%> and the <S%G5154>third,<s%> <S%G2193>down<s%> to the <S%G2033>seventh.<s%>
"And <S%G5305>last<s%> of <S%G3956>all,<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G599>died.<s%>
"In the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5101>whose<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%> of the <S%G2033>seven<s%> shall she be? For they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> her."

But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "You are <S%G4105>mistaken,<s%> not <S%G3609>understanding<s%> the <S%G1124>Scriptures,<s%> <S%G3366>or<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

"For in the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> they <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G1060>marry,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> are <S%G7031>given<s%> in <S%G7031>marriage,<s%> but are <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>
"But <S%G4012>regarding<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> have you not <S%G314>read<s%> that which was <S%G3004>spoken<s%> to you by <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

'I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> and the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> and the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2384>Jacob<s%>'? He is not the <S%G2316>God<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead<s%> but of the <S%G2198>living.<s%> "
And when the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> [this,] they were <S%G1605>astonished<s%> at His <S%G1322>teaching.<s%>

But when the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> that He had <S%G5392>put<s%> the <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%> to <S%G5392>silence,<s%> they <S%G4863>gathered<s%> themselves <S%G1909>together<s%><S%G3588>.<s%> <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G1520>one<s%> of them, a <S%G3544>lawyer,<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> Him [a question,] <S%G3985>testing<s%> Him,
<S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> <S%G4169>which<s%> is the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> in the <S%G3551>Law<s%>?"

And He <S%G5346>said<s%> to him, " 'You shall <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> your <S%G2316>God<s%> with <S%G3650>all<s%> your <S%G2588>heart,<s%> and with <S%G3650>all<s%> your <S%G5590>soul,<s%> and with <S%G3650>all<s%> your <S%G1271>mind.<s%>'
<S%G3778>"This<s%> is the <S%G3173>great<s%> and <S%G4413>foremost<s%> <S%G1785>commandment.<s%>
"The <S%G1208>second<s%> is <S%G3664>like<s%> it, 'You shall <S%G25>love<s%> your <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> as <S%G4572>yourself.<s%>'
"On <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G1785>commandments<s%> <S%G2910>depend<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3551>Law<s%> and the <S%G4396>Prophets.<s%>"
<S%G1161>Now<s%> while the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> were <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G4863>together,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> them a <S%G1905>question,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> do you <S%G1380>think<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G5101>whose<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> is He?" They <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "[The son] of <S%G7035>David.<s%>"
He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3767>"Then<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> does <S%G7035>David<s%> in the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2564>call<s%> Him <S%G2962>'Lord,<s%>' <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

'The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to my <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2521>"Sit<s%> at My <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>hand,<s%> <S%G2193>Until<s%> I <S%G5087>put<s%> <S%G4771>Thine<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%> <S%G5270>beneath<s%> Thy <S%G4228>feet<s%>"'?
" <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G7035>David<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G2564>calls<s%> Him <S%G2962>'Lord,<s%>' <S%G4459>how<s%> is He his <S%G5207>son<s%>?"

And <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> was <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G611>answer<s%> Him a <S%G3056>word,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> did <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G5111>dare<s%> from that <S%G2250>day<s%> on to <S%G1905>ask<s%> Him <S%G3765>another<s%> <S%G1905>question.<s%>
